statements: SELECT campaign_name, campaign_goal FROM crowdfunding_campaigns WHERE campaign_goal > 5000;
SELECT * FROM crowdfunding_campaigns WHERE campaign_start_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT campaign_name, contributor_name, contribution_amount FROM crowdfunding_campaigns WHERE contributor_name = 'Alice';
SELECT campaign_name, contribution_amount FROM crowdfunding_campaigns WHERE contribution_amount BETWEEN 100 AND 500;
SELECT campaign_name, campaign_end_date FROM crowdfunding_campaigns ORDER BY campaign_end_date DESC;
SELECT campaign_name, contribution_amount FROM crowdfunding_campaigns WHERE campaign_goal > 1000 ORDER BY campaign_name ASC, contribution_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM crowdfunding_campaigns WHERE contribution_amount > 5000 AND campaign_end_date > '2022-06-30' ORDER BY campaign_end_date DESC;

SELECT DISTINCT contributor_name, SUM(contribution_amount) AS total_contribution FROM crowdfunding_campaigns GROUP BY contributor_name HAVING total_contribution > 2000 ORDER BY total_contribution DESC;

SELECT campaign_name, campaign_goal, DATEDIFF(campaign_end_date, campaign_start_date) AS campaign_duration_days FROM crowdfunding_campaigns WHERE campaign_duration_days > 30 ORDER BY campaign_duration_days DESC;
SELECT campaign_name, AVG(contribution_amount) AS avg_contribution FROM crowdfunding_campaigns GROUP BY campaign_name HAVING avg_contribution > 500 ORDER BY avg_contribution DESC;
SELECT * FROM campaigns;
SELECT campaign_name, funds_raised FROM campaigns WHERE campaign_owner_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT campaign_id, campaign_name, funds_raised FROM campaigns ORDER BY funds_raised DESC;
SELECT campaign_name, contributed_amount FROM campaigns JOIN contributors ON campaigns.campaign_id = contributors.campaign_id WHERE contributed_amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM contributors WHERE contributor_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT * FROM campaigns WHERE funds_raised > 10000 ORDER BY funds_raised DESC
SELECT campaign_name, funds_raised FROM campaigns WHERE campaign_owner_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000'
SELECT campaign_name, contributed_amount FROM campaigns INNER JOIN contributors ON campaigns.campaign_id = contributors.campaign_id WHERE contributed_amount > 500 ORDER BY contributed_amount DESC
SELECT contributor_name, contributed_amount FROM contributors WHERE contributed_amount BETWEEN 100 AND 500
SELECT * FROM campaigns INNER JOIN contributors ON campaigns.campaign_id = contributors.campaign_id
SELECT * FROM campaigns;
SELECT campaign_name, campaign_goal FROM campaigns WHERE campaign_status = 'Active';
SELECT contributor_id, contributor_name FROM contributors WHERE total_contribution > 1000;
SELECT reward_name, reward_description FROM rewards ORDER BY reward_id DESC;

SELECT campaigns.campaign_name, contributors.contributor_name, rewards.reward_name FROM campaigns JOIN contributors ON campaigns.campaign_id = contributors.campaign_id JOIN rewards ON campaigns.campaign_id = rewards.campaign_id;
SELECT * FROM campaigns WHERE campaign_status = 'Active';
SELECT campaign_name, campaign_goal FROM campaigns WHERE campaign_goal > 5000 ORDER BY campaign_goal DESC;
SELECT contributor_name, total_contribution FROM contributors JOIN campaigns ON contributors.campaign_id = campaigns.campaign_id WHERE campaign_name LIKE '%Summer%';

SELECT campaign_name, COUNT(*) AS total_contributors FROM contributors JOIN campaigns ON contributors.campaign_id = campaigns.campaign_id GROUP BY campaign_name HAVING total_contributors > 10 ORDER BY total_contributors DESC;

SELECT campaign_name, reward_name, reward_description FROM campaigns JOIN rewards ON campaigns.campaign_id = rewards.campaign_id WHERE rewards.reward_description IS NOT NULL ORDER BY campaign_name ASC, reward_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM campaigns;
SELECT campaign_name, goal_amount FROM campaigns ORDER BY end_date DESC;
SELECT backer_name, email, location FROM backers WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT sum(amount) AS total_amount FROM contributions WHERE campaign_id = 1;
SELECT rating, comment FROM ratings WHERE backer_id = 1 AND campaign_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM campaigns ORDER BY start_date DESC, goal_amount ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT campaign_id, campaign_name, start_date FROM campaigns WHERE end_date > '2021-09-30';
SELECT campaign_name, goal_amount, current_amount FROM campaigns WHERE current_amount < goal_amount * 0.5;
SELECT b.backer_name, c.campaign_name, co.amount FROM backers b JOIN contributions co ON b.backer_id = co.backer_id JOIN campaigns c ON co.campaign_id = c.campaign_id WHERE co.amount > 1000;
SELECT c.campaign_name, r.rating, r.comment FROM campaigns c JOIN ratings r ON c.campaign_id = r.campaign_id WHERE r.rating > 3 ORDER BY r.rating DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM campaign WHERE id = 1;
SELECT title, start_date, goal_amount FROM campaign WHERE end_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT campaign.id, campaign.title, contributor.name FROM campaign JOIN contribution ON campaign.id = contribution.campaign_id JOIN contributor ON contributor.id = contribution.contributor_id;
SELECT contributor.name, SUM(contribution.amount) AS total_contributions FROM contributor JOIN contribution ON contributor.id = contribution.contributor_id GROUP BY contributor.name;
SELECT reward.description, pledge.amount FROM reward JOIN pledge ON reward.id = pledge.reward_id ORDER BY pledge.amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM campaign ORDER BY start_date DESC, goal_amount ASC
SELECT contributor.name, contribution.amount FROM contributor JOIN contribution ON contributor.id = contribution.contributor_id WHERE contribution.amount > 100 ORDER BY contribution.amount DESC

SELECT campaign.title, reward.description, pledge.amount FROM campaign JOIN reward ON campaign.id = reward.campaign_id JOIN pledge ON reward.id = pledge.reward_id WHERE pledge.amount > 50 ORDER BY campaign.title ASC

SELECT contributor.name, SUM(contribution.amount) AS total_contributions FROM contributor JOIN contribution ON contributor.id = contribution.contributor_id GROUP BY contributor.name ORDER BY total_contributions DESC

SELECT campaign.title, COUNT(pledge.id) AS total_pledges FROM campaign JOIN reward ON campaign.id = reward.campaign_id JOIN pledge ON reward.id = pledge.reward_id GROUP BY campaign.title ORDER BY total_pledges DESC
